review: We cut the cord on our cable.  I purchased 1 to try and went back and bought another. There are so many apps to watch so many programs.  Get rid of your DVR.  You dont need it with this.  Yes some shows you have to wait on. But I find me self watching shows I have not seen from season 1 thru season 5 back to back.  I just dont have enought time to  watch them.  Runs great off of wifi.
author: Girly66

review: Love that it shows what I watch all in  one place Hulu, Amazon instant video, and Netflix. Games are great but I don't play much. I use mostly for movies and missed TV shows.  I have a smart TV and my daughters prime account is loaded on the TV and my prime is on the Fire TV so we don't have to log out when switching between accounts. Hulu loads a lot faster on the Fire than on my TV (it gets caught up a lot on TV even after clearing my que).  The Auto play option is great when watching an entire season and easy to turn off when not wanted.
